shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000

per_frame_init_1=
per_frame_init_2=zoom=1;
per_frame_init_3=xpos=0;
per_frame_init_4=ypos=0;
per_frame_1=decay=1;
per_frame_2=ob_r=1-abs(sin(time/2));
per_frame_3=ob_g=1-abs(sin(time/2));
per_frame_4=ob_b=1-abs(sin(time/2));
per_frame_5=ib_r=1-abs(cos(time/3));
per_frame_6=ib_g=1-abs(cos(time/3));
per_frame_7=ib_b=1-abs(cos(time/3));
per_frame_8=q1 = if(above(abs(ob_size - ib_size),0.06),17,0.8);
per_frame_9=ob_size=abs(sin(time/(5*q1))/13);
per_frame_10=ib_size=0.08-ob_size;
per_frame_11=volume = (bass_att+mid_att+treb_att)/3;
per_frame_12=beat_threshold = 1.7/((tb+tt)*0.5);
per_frame_13=time_threshold = 0.8;
per_frame_14=highpitch = 0.9 * treb_att + 0.1 * mid_att;
per_frame_15=lowpitch = bass_att;
per_frame_16=beat_bass = if(above(lowpitch,last_bass*beat_threshold),1,0);
per_frame_17=beat_treb = if(above(highpitch,last_treb*beat_threshold),1,0);
per_frame_18=timegap_bass = if(equal(beat_bass,1), (time-ltb), tgb);
per_frame_19=timegap_treb = if(equal(beat_treb,1), (time-ltt), tgt);
per_frame_20=tgb = timegap_bass;
per_frame_21=tgt = timegap_treb;
per_frame_22=last_time_bass = if(equal(beat_bass,1), time, ltb);
per_frame_23=last_time_treb = if(equal(beat_treb,1), time, ltt);
per_frame_24=ltb = last_time_bass;
per_frame_25=ltt = last_time_treb;
per_frame_26=tempo_bass = if(equal(beat_bass,1), (tb * 0.92 + 0.08 * tgb), tb);
per_frame_27=tempo_treb = if(equal(beat_treb,1), (tt * 0.92 + 0.08 * tgt), tt);
per_frame_28=tb = tempo_bass;
per_frame_29=tt = tempo_treb;
per_frame_30=q2 = beat_bass;
per_frame_31=q3 = beat_treb;
per_frame_32=q4 = ob_r;
per_frame_33=q5 = ib_r;
per_frame_34=q6 = volume;
per_frame_35=
per_frame_36=
per_frame_37=
per_frame_38=
per_frame_39=
per_frame_40=
per_frame_41=
per_frame_42=
per_frame_43=
per_frame_44=monitor = downbeat;
per_frame_45=
per_frame_46=
per_frame_47=last_treb = highpitch;
per_frame_48=last_bass = lowpitch;
per_frame_49=rot=sin(time/5.3);
per_frame_50=beat = 0;
per_frame_51=dx= sin(time/4.4)/5;
per_frame_52=dy= cos(time/3.6)/5;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float2 scale = float2(1280,1024)*texsize.zw; // 1280x1024 : the resolution i modelled this shader with
warp_4=`    float1 d = 0.005;
warp_5=`    float1 dx = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).x*scale.x;
warp_6=`    float1 dy = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).x*scale.y;
warp_7=`    float1 dxb = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).x*scale.x;
warp_8=`    float1 dyb = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).x*scale.y;
warp_9=`    float2 my_uv = uv - float2(dx,dy)*0.01 + float2(dxb,dyb)*0.003;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`
warp_12=`
warp_13=`    float2 v = 0.01;
warp_14=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv -floor(my_uv)*0).x;
warp_15=`
warp_16=`    
warp_17=`    ret.x += (ret.x - GetBlur3(uv).x)*.1;
warp_18=`    ret.x += 0.004;
warp_19=`
warp_20=`
warp_21=`//--------------------------------
warp_22=`
warp_23=`    my_uv = uv + float2(dy,-dx)*0.05*(1.2-GetBlur3(uv).y);
warp_24=`
warp_25=`
warp_26=`
warp_27=`    v = 0.01;
warp_28=`    ret.z = tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv).z;
warp_29=`    
warp_30=`    ret.z += (ret.z - GetBlur1(uv).z)*length(my_uv-uv)*180/length(scale);
warp_31=`    ret.z *= 0.8;
warp_32=`    ret.z += 0.004;
warp_33=`
warp_34=`
warp_35=`
warp_36=`//--------------------------------
warp_37=`
warp_38=`    d = 0.01;
warp_39=`    my_uv = float2(-dy,dx)*0.045;
warp_40=`
warp_41=`    dx = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).y*scale.x;
warp_42=`    dy = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).y*scale.y;
warp_43=`    my_uv += uv - float2(dx,dy)*0.03;
warp_44=`
warp_45=`
warp_46=`
warp_47=`    v = 0.01;
warp_48=`    ret.y =tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv).y;
warp_49=`
warp_50=`    
warp_51=`    ret.y += (ret.y - GetBlur3(my_uv).y)*0.1 + 0.01;
warp_52=`//ret = 0;
warp_53=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    float2 uv_post = uv + float2(0.005*(_qa.y+_qb.y),0.005*(_qa.z+_qb.y));
comp_4=`    	
comp_5=`    ret = lerp(float3(0,0,0),lerp(float3(_qb.x,_qb.x,_qb.x),float3(_qa.w,_qa.w,_qa.w),tex2D(sampler_main, uv_post)),tex2D(sampler_main, uv));
comp_6=`    
comp_7=`}
